name: Meal Planner
description: About the templateIntroducing the Meal Planner Template - the perfect tool for efficient and organized meal planning. This all-in-one template is designed to help you plan your meals for the week, create shopping lists, save recipes, and manage your daily consumption.With this template, you can easily plan your meals for the upcoming week and view them in a convenient calendar format. It allows you to save recipes with all the necessary ingredients, which can be automatically added to your shopp
features: After purchasing the template, you will be redirected to Notion.; Click on the "Duplicate" button located in the top right corner. This will duplicate the template to your Notion workspace.; Congratulations! You can now start using the template and make all the adjusments needed to fit your needs.
